name: Valkyrie's Quest (Unfinished)
description:
CONTROLS -
Q to Attack
E to Interact
WASD/Arrows to Move
Refresh on death, when the player leaves the room with the king, that's the end of the game. The cutscene is bugged.

CREDITS -
Programming and Art
Nina Buie

Music (Free Use)
Rolemusic - The Black


POST MORTEM -
I protoyped this project fast, but then became disenchanted by it, so it's in an unfinished state. I started by wanting to make a tilebased RPG, but then decided to do combat, but it wasn't very good so I became demotivated.  I think it's a bit lonely to do it yourself.
